datatypeProperties.comment: Does the standard have criteria for the assessment of final product potential for re-use and recycling of non-food products
Does the standard cover criteria on the quality of textiles?
Does the standard include criteria on the suitability of the product for the intended purpose?
Does the standard have requirements related to final products technical specifications and suitability of non-food products
Does the standard body require that a Quality Management System has established and monitored inputs purchasing policies and suppliers' clearance processes
Does the standard have requirements related to technical processes for manufacturing / processing of non-food products
